text.title: Mindfulness Meditation
text.description: Practice mindfulness meditation to improve focus and reduce stress.
text.additionalInfo: Recommended for beginners.

text.title: Meditation for Kids
text.description: Repeat positive affirmations to boost confidence and self-esteem.
text.additionalInfo: Daily practice is beneficial.

text.title: Deep Breathing Exercises
text.description: Try deep breathing exercises to relax the mind and body.
text.additionalInfo: Take slow, deep breaths.

text.title: Difficult Emotions
text.description: Use visualization techniques to achieve your goals and dreams.
text.additionalInfo: Imagine your desired outcomes in vivid detail.

text.title: Gratitude Journaling
text.description: Keep a gratitude journal to cultivate a positive mindset.
text.additionalInfo: Write down things you're grateful for every day.

text.title: Body Scan Meditation
text.description: Practice body scan meditation to relax your body and mind.
text.additionalInfo: Focus on each part of your body and release tension.

text.title: Sleep Meditation
text.description: Use creative visualization to manifest your desires into reality.
text.additionalInfo: Imagine yourself achieving your goals with all your senses.

text.title: Nature Walks
text.description: Go for nature walks to connect with the natural world and clear your mind.
text.additionalInfo: Take deep breaths and notice the beauty around you.

text.title: Stress Ball Squeezes
text.description: Use stress balls to relieve tension and stress in your hands and body.
text.additionalInfo: Squeeze and release the stress away.

text.title: A Guide to Meditation (Hindi)
text.description: Use affirmation cards to start your day with positive affirmations.
text.additionalInfo: Pick a card and read the affirmation aloud.

text.title: Mindful Eating
text.description: Practice mindful eating to savor your food and improve digestion.
text.additionalInfo: Eat slowly and pay attention to the taste and texture of each bite.

text.title: Gratitude Meditation
text.description: Practice gratitude meditation to cultivate appreciation and contentment.
text.additionalInfo: Think of things you're grateful for and express thanks.

text.title: Intermediate
text.description: Start journaling to express your thoughts, feelings, and ideas.
text.additionalInfo: Write freely without judgment or criticism.

text.title: Happiness by Nithya Shanti
text.description: Listen to guided imagery recordings to relax and visualize positive outcomes.
text.additionalInfo: Close your eyes and follow along with the instructions.

text.title: Mindfulness Apps
text.description: Download mindfulness apps to access guided meditations and exercises.
text.additionalInfo: Practice mindfulness anywhere, anytime.

text.title: Breath Counting
text.description: Practice breath counting to calm your mind and increase focus.
text.additionalInfo: Count each inhale and exhale up to a certain number.

text.title: Yoga
text.description: Practice yoga to improve flexibility, strength, and mental clarity.
text.additionalInfo: Follow along with yoga videos or attend classes.

text.title: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
text.description: Practice progressive muscle relaxation to release tension and stress.
text.additionalInfo: Tense and relax each muscle group in your body.

text.title: Saying YES to Life
text.description: Practice visualization meditation to create a positive mental image.
text.additionalInfo: Imagine yourself achieving your goals and desires.

text.title: Meditation - Yoga Nidra
text.description: Coloring books can be a therapeutic way to relax and de-stress.
text.additionalInfo: Choose intricate designs and focus on the colors.

text.title: Music Therapy
text.description: Listen to calming music to reduce stress and promote relaxation.
text.additionalInfo: Create playlists with your favorite soothing tunes.

text.title: Walking Meditation
text.description: Practice walking meditation to be present and mindful while walking.
text.additionalInfo: Focus on the sensation of each step.

text.title: 30 Minutes Pranayama
text.description: Sensory bins can provide a calming and engaging sensory experience.
text.additionalInfo: Fill a bin with items like sand, rice, or water beads.

text.title: Emotional health in a global crisis
text.description: Repeat a mantra to quiet the mind and cultivate inner peace.
text.additionalInfo: Choose a mantra that resonates with you.

text.title: Practice Meditation - Advanced
text.description: Laughter is a powerful tool for reducing stress and boosting mood.
text.additionalInfo: Watch a comedy show or share jokes with friends.

text.title: Relationship Healing
text.description: This meditation pack on Relationships created by Spiritual Coach ModMonk Anshul will take you on a journey of bonding with yourself and will help in building a bridge of love, forgiveness, and acceptance with everyone around you.
text.additionalInfo: Relation heath is important

text.title: Everyday Short Meditations
text.description: Practice Tai Chi to improve balance, flexibility, and mental well-being.
text.additionalInfo: Follow along with Tai Chi videos or classes.

text.title: Sleep Stories for Kids
text.description: Keep a progress journal to track your personal growth and achievements.
text.additionalInfo: Write down milestones and reflect on your journey.

text.title: Falling into Sleep
text.description: Use images and art to express your thoughts, emotions, and ideas.
text.additionalInfo: Draw, paint, or collage in a journal.

text.title: Relationship Healing
text.description: This meditation pack on Relationships created by Spiritual Coach ModMonk Anshul.
text.additionalInfo: Focus on the sensations in your body as you move.
